title: Drawing, Design for Music Cabinet "A" of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Music Cabinet "A" of Mahogany and Inlay
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Insribed in graphite, upper left corner: "A"; at upper right, lower right, and center, numerical notations indicating dimensions; at center left of design with arrow pointing to upper shelf door panel: inlay; below right of design: MUSIC CABINET / OF MAHOGANY AND INLAY
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular body with hinged upper drawer and 2 open lower shelves with stacks of books and music notebooks separated by molded dividers; raised on 4 small tapering en toupee feet; flower vase and open book atop cabinet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Music Cabinet "A" of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-215.
